title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Continuing Medical Education: e-Learning Based on Integrated Instructional and Motivational Design Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and clinical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the etiology, diagnosis, and clinical management of acute respiratory failure with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply knowledge acquired from e-learning modules to real patient cases with over 70% accuracy.
Learners can maintain learning motivation at an average of 4/5 or higher on a 5-point Likert scale in motivation-design-based learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
